product_name: Yakima Bolt Top Loader Brackets - 1 Pair
long_description: The Yakima Bolt Top Loader brackets create a base on which to mount 1A Raingutter Towers to camper shells, caps or in other special circumstances. Bolt Top Loader Backets are designed for when you can access the underside of the mounting surface. Custom installation is relatively straight-forward, but does involve drilling a few holes. All mounting hardware and instructions included. For a complete rack, you will also need 1 set of 1A Raingutter Towers and 1 pair of Yakima crossbars, sold separately. Depending on your vehicle and situation, you may need 1 pair or 2 pairs of Bolt Top Loader Brackets; refer to Yakima's Fit List for fit information.
short_description: The Yakima Bolt Top Loader brackets create a base on which to mount 1A Raingutter Towers to camper shells, caps or in other special circumstances.
